sentences.sContent: The Japanese Spider Crab is the biggest arthropod on Earth--their legs are believed to grow up to 12 feet long.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Japanese Spider Crab is the biggest arthropod on Earth--their legs are believed to grow up to 12 feet long.
sentences.sCn: 日本的蟹型蜘蛛是地球上最大的节肢动物，它们的腿被认为能够长到12英尺长。

sentences.sContent: We were hoping that was just a tiny trash can but, no, it's a coconut crab, which is the biggest arthropod that lives on land.
sentences.sContent_eng: We were hoping that was just a tiny trash can but, no, it's a coconut crab, which is the biggest arthropod that lives on land.
sentences.sCn: 我们本以为这是一个小小的垃圾桶，但是不，这是只椰子蟹，该物种是陆地上最大的节肢动物。

sentences.sContent: “Charlotte’s Web.” The story of the spider who saves her friend, the pig, is the kindest representation of an arthropod in literary history.
sentences.sContent_eng: “Charlotte’s Web.” The story of the spider who saves her friend, the pig, is the kindest representation of an arthropod in literary history.
sentences.sCn: 《夏洛特的网》讲述了一只蜘蛛拯救她的猪朋友的故事，蜘蛛夏洛特成为文学史上最善良的节肢动物的代表。

trans.tranOther: any invertebrate of the phylum Arthropoda, having jointed limbs, a segmented body, and an exoskeleton made of chitin
